prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Bass, Drums, Piano, Guitar, but without Organ.
captions:
Style 1:
Guitar, Piano, Bass, and Drums are all featured in this song, but without the Organ.

Style 2:
This song has Bass, Drums, Piano, and Guitar, but no Organ.

Style 3:
The instruments used in this song are Bass, Drums, Piano, and Guitar, Organ excluded.
